Key Match Events: Vangelis Pavlidis scored the winning goal in the 94th minute
Jude Bellingham scored an equalizer in the 91st minute
Pre-Game Insights: Lee Carsley set up with an ultra-attacking XI against Greece
Carsley started Anthony Gordon, Bukayo Saka, Cole Palmer, Phil Foden, and Bellingham without a recognized forward
Post-Match Reflections: England's first competitive loss at Wembley in four years
Lee Carsley took a knock in the third match of his interim tenure
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pavlidis dedicated his first goal to his former national team-mate George Baldock
Others: Pavlidis could have had a hat-trick
Colwill made a goalline clearance in the 10th minute
